price: 100.Ama Qhuraanat dorre cabeeh kaa nummayse weeh kaal taniimil taamite wee num toysa diggah usuk Qhiyaamah ayro qilsi dambi quukak yamaate, isi Rabbih xaqu.
arabic: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وِزۡرًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: man aʿraḍa ʿanhu fa-innahu yaḥmilu yawma al-qiyāmati wiz'ran
